name: AstroJam - PreAlpha
description:
Adventure game from Rusl1.

The player is a robot that must complete missions.

THIS IS a preliminary alpha release.

In alpha, maybe I'll add some enemies

and some obstacles for the player, as in Death Stranding.

And in the alpha version, I'll add -

!!! Mars rover !!!

if you download the game I will be very grateful.

HOW YOU CAN SEE NEW SCREEN SHOT I AM MAKING THE CAR

:)
